statement.p: Find the perimeter and area of the parallelogram above. Side lengths are measurements.

solution.p: Perimeter is the sum of the sides: \displaystyle{2}{\left({4.24}+{6.42}\right)}={21.32}\approx{21.32}.
Area is height times base (side perpendicular to height): \displaystyle{6.42}\cdot{3.87}={24.8454}\approx{24.8}.
